description: A FREE puzzle game that defies the laws of physics! Based on the DreamWorks movie, HOME: Boov Pop! offers a new twist to puzzle games, by adding a unique gravity-based physics mechanism and out of this world 3D graphics!‚Ä¢ Connect candy colored Boov bubbles to match 3 or more and make them POP! ‚Ä¢ Play with the characters you love from the movie: Oh, Tip, Captain Smek and Pig!‚Ä¢ Go on an adventure around the world across a variety of exciting and challenging levels. ‚Ä¢ Each of the characters has unique abilities: Use Oh‚Äôs Moody Pop to make all bubbles of the same color pop, or activate Tip‚Äôs Gravity Ball to swap colors and solve the puzzle, and more!‚Ä¢ Choose from 3 power ups to turbo charge your game: cross blast, magnetic and Rainbowfy.‚Ä¢ Beautiful 3D graphics and awesome bubble physics brings magic and life to the game!Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BoovPopHome is a 2015 movie from DreamWorks, the makers of How to train your Dragon and Shrek. It is loosely based on Adam Rex's 2007 children's book The True Meaning of Smekday and stars Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez. The saga takes place on planet Earth, where an alien race called the Boov invade the planet. A girl named Tip becomes friends with Oh, a fugitive Boov, and together with her friend Pig the cat they go on adventure to find Tip‚Äôs mom
descriptionHTML:
A FREE puzzle game that defies the laws of physics! Based on the DreamWorks movie, HOME: Boov Pop! offers a new twist to puzzle games, by adding a unique gravity-based physics mechanism and out of this world 3D graphics!

• Connect candy colored Boov bubbles to match 3 or more and make them POP!

• Play with the characters you love from the movie: Oh, Tip, Captain Smek and Pig!

• Go on an adventure around the world across a variety of exciting and challenging levels.

• Each of the characters has unique abilities: Use Oh’s Moody Pop to make all bubbles of the same color pop, or activate Tip’s Gravity Ball to swap colors and solve the puzzle, and more!

• Choose from 3 power ups to turbo charge your game: cross blast, magnetic and Rainbowfy.

• Beautiful 3D graphics and awesome bubble physics brings magic and life to the game!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BoovPop

Home is a 2015 movie from DreamWorks, the makers of How to train your Dragon and Shrek. It is loosely based on Adam Rex's 2007 children's book The True Meaning of Smekday and stars Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez. The saga takes place on planet Earth, where an alien race called the Boov invade the planet. A girl named Tip becomes friends with Oh, a fugitive Boov, and together with her friend Pig the cat they go on adventure to find Tip’s mom
developerAddress:
6666 Saint-Urbain, Suite 500
Montreal, QC
H2S 3H1 CANADA
summary: Meet our future leaders, the Boov, from DreamWorks Animation's film HOME.
title: Home: Boov Pop!

As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.Your job is simple - survive.‚ñ† FeaturesKill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!Simply tap to fire your gun.Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.Experience this simple, yet strategic game!‚ñ† InfoYou can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.Kill zombies for Gold. descriptionHTML:
■ Survival mode unlocked!
■ New items, stages and zombies!
■ Adjusted difficulty level.

■ Synopsis
Once an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.
Your job is simple - survive.

■ Features
Kill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!

Simply tap to fire your gun.
Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.

Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.

Experience this simple, yet strategic game!

■ Info
You can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.
There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.
Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.
Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.
Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.
As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time.
Collect various inventory items for additional strength.
It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.
Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.
When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.
Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.
When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.
If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.
There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.

■ This game saves player data in device. Deleting the app will terminate all save data.

comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

I like it alot but the issue with it is that prices go up to fast and you dont get enough when you upgrade things, its almost pointless. Other than this MAJOR issue its great! In sereosness i do enjoy playing this game alot and i recomend it to you all!

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

comments: Pretty good game. Few suggestions:  1. Make this completely offline gathering.  If I leave the game for whatever reason and come back to it, sometimes I can see gold accumulate and sometimes not.  2. When watching ads for gems: the game pauses.  If the gold keep accumulates, I am happy to keep watching ads.

As an idle game, love it; just one wish - Is there really no option to auto-reincarnate? Easily dealing with lvl15k mobs through Bar brawl (yes, I've dropped bout a $30) yet I'm only at 15-20 reincarnations (round lvl 5k at stage 200).. Let me leave the app open for an hour and gain.. Like, 3 reincarnations; please.
Why is the font so blurry? Also "you will watch ads" sounds like a threat lol. Might want to work on that translation

Pretty good for the most part. My only concern is that we only have one controlable skill beside our energy beam attack. Wish there was more. Other than that I love the graphics along with the how the game is expanding the clicking genre of rpg's. Keep up the good work.
Not bad. Old school graphics, fast pace. Time consuming (because of ads)

Great game but it definitely needs more useable skills. I think even during my first run I hardly touched any of them.   Seriously needs the ability to auto-reincarnate a lot earlier. As it stands you have to practically accomplish everything possible to finally auto reincarnate and at that point, you don't need to do runs anymore.

Fun, but not Blocky Roads fun. I was hoping since the developer is no longer updating Blocky Roads that this game would be just as good. Unfortunately, it's just not. You can't use custom vehicles, coins are very hard to gather and even when you have 100 they can just be useless if the prize box you choose contains a car you already own. You can waste some time on courses a couple of times, but the available cars are just boring.

The restore purchases didn't work out for us and now he cries everytime he tries to choose one of his old vehicles because it locked. Better I download another app for him. Thanks alot!

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.Game features:1. Original background music2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap4. Music is the key to guide you5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: Good, comedic, unique clicker.  This game is a specimen all on it's own. It is a clicker game, but has so many non-clicker features that just make it such a good game. For one, the *characters*. It constantly remembers that you go back in time, as well as their memories. You have the smart and the not-so-much. It makes for a comedic experience, which brings me to my next point. It is *FUNNY*. It mixes in the comedic touch lacked by...everything. With what else is going on, it is laughable! Which brings me to my final point. It has a great *story*! It ties in sometung devilish going on in the background.  But is there a setting to remove Tucker reminding you about his planet core chunk shop?

This started our amazing. And then got really boring. Like after the 5th loop and they said I needed to do 23 more... same planets, same upgrades... love the story it's just boring. So I came to the reviews. Other people lasted longer than I did. I'm installing but I DID enjoy it while it was fun.

If you like "Cookie Clicker", and other clicker games, this has a similar gameplay style, collecting melons by clicking to plant then spending melons to speed up your profits. However, what kept me going was the simple, but fun "Story". Basically, after playing 3 Planetary systems, you time travel and repeat the process in a time loop, with the characters learning from their past time. This was fun and funny at first, and I was promised to be able to escape the loop after about five or ten loops, it was a tough but satisfying grind. However, when told I'd need to then repeat the loop 32 times . . . I uninstalled. If you like these repetitive clicker toys, this is worth it, but as addicting as this is, I lost interest after seeing the same 25 or so planets repeating that many times.
I thought each loop would be different, but after the 4th time, nothing new. After about four more loops, I gave up. It started out fun, but then it became a chore.

Good game but would like some more dialog when going through the later loops as there is not much there to keep one interested and a way to turn Mellons in to core chunks but except for that is is great.
Since the tenth loop I have nothing to spend my melons on, I purchased all the skill and tool upgrades that can be bought with melons,  now I have 100b melons with only 24 mil per minute

ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES ‚Ä¢ For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at¬†http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.‚Ä¢ This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game.¬†Social Networking Service terms may also apply.‚Ä¢ The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.‚Ä¢ You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at¬†http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga‚Äôs Privacy Policy, found at¬†¬†http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.¬†
descriptionHTML:
Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise!

Adventure unfolds all around your island!

ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting

UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets

BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island

DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests

TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island

ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

descriptionHTML:
Pu is a cute little panda bear who loves to eat, have fun and take selfies. He expects you to feed him, dress him, clean him and take care of him like an animal.
Dozens of activities and exciting mini-games are available to take care of your new baby pet.
Are you ready to take care of your new and adorable virtual pet ?

► ADOPT PU : Give him a special name and make it evolve to reach his adult size. He is so cute !
► DRESS PU : Make the baby Pu cute and adorable like you ! Dress it up in fashion where to disguise it, create your own look !
► FEED PU : Pu loves the tasty and delicious food, it will feast !
► GIVE A BATH : In order for Pu to be clean and pretty, wash it and dab it.
► PLAY WITH PU : Full of fun mini-games to win coins and make your animal Happy ! But also challenges every day to win diamonds !
► SLEEP TIME : After a happy day, Pu is sleepy, lining it up to make him sleep.
► DECORATE THE HOUSE : The walls, floors, carpet, bathtub and still other elements to make your home unique !

This game is a free virtual animal game created by a small independent developer, a game that caters girls and boys and that I hope you will enjoy.

WHO IS THE GIANT PANDA BEAR?
Pu is an adorable baby pet.
He does not know how to care and take care of himself so he expects you to teach him ! Here are a few tips to make him happy and cheerful: Check that he has always eaten enough and that he is clean !
Pu is very gambler, he does not ask much time, play games a few minutes with him and he will be very happy and affectionate but be careful, after playing well it must be given a bath and bed.
He will then be in good shape and will grow quietly.

If you dream of taking care an animal and looking after a cute virtual baby animal, to see it grow, this game is perfect for you !
Adopt Pu and do in the happiest pets, you have to play !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.
This game is not primarily directed to children under the age of 13.

comments: I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

EDIT TO PREVIOUS REVIEW: I PAYED FOR AD FREE AND REINSTALLED IT AND NO LONGER HAVE AD FREE!  I loved basically all of it except... If you don't buy ad free the game is completely unbearable with how many ads there are. Also I absolutely hate how it kicks me out of the challenges after I die if I tap too many times or I hold the screen while waiting for it to load.

descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
recentChanges: "Tiny Parties" are available now! These are small short-time events. For example, all buildings get skill "Death: deals 10 DMG to enemy warlord" or all "Titanias" get double HP.
Create a deck that will rule the ladder!
A lot of small fixes and improvements
summary: Epic Warlords & strategic PvP fights returns in fast turn-based RPG Mighty Party
title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

descriptionHTML:
Play match 3 games in paradise! The ice cream and sunshine are tantalizingly sweet in this fun filled match 3 puzzle game. descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: Gozura is the artillery officer of the Frost-Blood Orcs. She is feared by allies and enemies alike due to her weapon of choice.
Defeat Gozura in her enclave and collect shards for a new regiment!

Once liberated, this orc regiment will blow up your opponents. This heavily armored, ranged unit provides a damage boost for all allied orcs and goblins while on the battlefield. She uses goblins as projectiles and fires them behind enemy lines for an ambush.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

comments: The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want

First off, I'd like to give a big thank you to the developers for this game. It's amazing.  However, I've been encountering quite a few bugs lately. One day, picking up a hover feather crashed the game. Today, I can't pick up llama horns, and the background blur that happens when you go into the workshop stayed into an actual run. I took this as a challenge and continued playing. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 9.7 running Android Marshmallow.  This is just to tip you guys off on some bugs.

This was the must have game- I think, for a while. Then the newest update came out. Now it has ads you must veiw (before totally optional for more coins or an extra run) and added FTP elements. Took from a 5 star classic, to barely 2 stars. Thankfully, the base game play was untouched, and still well worth the advertisements, but I'm very sad for this move on the part of the dev team.

I have 'noisy' brain and anxiety and sometimes the world is too much to bear. This game keeps me calm and collected all the time. The music and gameplay soothe me up. I do get frustrated over the goals but I have nothing but praise and love for this game. Thank you to everyone involved. You all helped a lot. Cannot wait for Alto's Odyssey for Android!
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders ‚Äì all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:‚Ä¢ Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay‚Ä¢ Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding‚Ä¢ Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more‚Ä¢ Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system‚Ä¢ Chain together combos to maximize points and speed‚Ä¢ Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals‚Ä¢ Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!‚Ä¢ Acquire the wingsuit from Izel‚Äôs workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic‚Ä¢ Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design‚Ä¢ Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"‚Äì WIRED"One of the best mobile games"‚Äì The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"‚Äì IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"‚Äì TIME
descriptionHTML:
Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

Reviews:

"A piece of interactive art"
– WIRED

"One of the best mobile games"
– The Verge

"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"
– IGN

"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"
– TIME

comments: I rather enjoy the game a lot. It feels balanced for the most part,  leveling takes a while which wouldn't be a issue if it didn't take so long to go place to place. Gets sort of annoying to go back and forth trying to get resources and the game goes from fun to grindy quickly.   My main issue is the battery life of my phone. While charging my phone and playing this game but battery was being drained.  Graphics are good, I enjoy the crafting and base building, the combat is nice, and the auto harvest feature is a life saver.

**UPDATE** Is an awesome game. Could use a few more perks (ie. Weapons and hard to get items) in drop boxes and yellow zones.Now the down side is if you die in a level your last position is no longer there to try and recoup some of your items. Players killing you as you open trunks in inventory. Oh ya and the free spin box...give random prizes instead of coins and rope. People will get really into it if perks are awesome. Great game could be the best with a couple tweaks. Awesome job.

Just another game that either makes you wait to play it, or pay not to wait. Why? Don't make me pay not to wait. Entice me to pay with cool things, otherwise it's an instant uninstall. Poor business model. Imagine paying double to get them to make your food faster at a restaurant, or just wait a long time. Would you really keep going there, or somewhere else that makes something just as good but in a reasonable amount of time?

Anyway i edit this review... The is nice and graphics are cool. But there is the problem on the game. Could you pls remove the energy bar so i can still play the without waiting to fill the energy bar... Cause otherwise i less play this game in days... that you know you must wait your energy bar to fill again in a couple of minutes if the energy is gone?. Pls Remove it so we can play all day along.. Thank you.

This game truly amazing with beautiful graphics, decent yet easy controls, a large amunt of items and okay customization. The only reason i give this a 4 star rating is because one thing. The hoard mechanic. I mean it's a good concept. The only problem is that there's a hoard every 24 hours. And since wood is kinda pain to get it sucks to come back after work to come to a destroyed house. If it was like every month or heck even every week that would be fine just please give more time than 24 hours for a hoard

Not happy at the moment after the latest updates... No point of spending any cash seeing that you went from getting a loot box to only getting one item at a time... Some parts are still impossible to come by even clearing the infected forest. Hope the next update will be more worthwhile. Apart from that still a good game. Keep it up

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.
Can get expensive... and be sure to keep track of purchases because on numerous occasions i have been double sometimes tripple billed.

descriptionHTML:
Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings?

FEATURES :

War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne!

Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust.

Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours?

Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime.

Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion!

Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon fire warzone!

Epic Fantasy! The Camelot Legend lives. Awesome monsters and HD graphics to drool over. Now play the King of online games, King of Avalon!

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/king-of-avalon/

comments: I'm really enjoying this game - it's surprisingly advanced for an app. Plays very smoothly and looks pretty. One annoying thing is I get network connection bugs from time to time flashing up. They don't stop me from playing tho, so meh. Also, the way they match players together is sometimes pretty suss, ships that wipe you out in two seconds flat...or less... just shouldn't be matched with you. But, overall pretty great.

After a while playing I feel a new ship is needed. A ship that is used to support and repair team. I also think an actual alliance base would be nice to use. Assault another's base to gain upgrades for alliance base could be rewards. I just feel there needs to be something else to do besides a match vs other's. Maybe even have tactical station's where player's occupy turrets so dual pilots can occupy a ship, each with roles to fulfill.

It's a good game.  Three things I may add.  Every so often when you improve a ship , the app goes "improvement failed" yet but takes your coins. Bit frustrating. Secondly, the matchmaking can be at times frustrating too, you're getting wrecked in seconds by other very powerful ones.. And last thing , hey , the music of the game becomes straight boring and dull after a while. Add something , anything , Frank Sinatra  ffs , you got about 15 seconds of soundtrack in all this game..

Great game. It's easy to play and easy to level up. But, this game lacks a clan system and varried game modes. Right now it only has two game modes; Survival (free-for-all) and team death match. The game also, doesnt have a chat system for in battle games. They kind of need more ships for each type, they have 4 or 5 frigates, (early, in game ships) but the latter ships there are not very many of them there's 3 or 2 for each of those types. Another problem is, there are are'nt very many ways get new equipment the store, only has like 4 weapons, it resets after every 4 hours. You could get more weapons in the tournament events. But other than that, there's really not many ways to get new weapons. Overall: game is really fun, the in game special offers are really nice deals, so you won't find yourself spending very much money.

Help! In game issue, I have a "superheavy cruise cannon" in my inventory and it looks as though my "Arbiter" ship has a special slot for that type of weapon but when I click the slot my cannon is not there! Instead it shows up when I click the slot for regular turrets, any help is appreciated. Username:RoyalStickman, amazing game will put rating back to 5star after

Plays great, but I can't put my super heavy weapons in the super heavy slot. And all the players who two days ago were fighting two tier under me have ships now a tier above. I don't think this is real live gameplay.

descriptionHTML:
Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! Use strategy and command your army of holy knights to attack your enemies (or friends) and battle your way to glory in this new game - PaladinZ: Champions of Might!

PaladinZ is simple and easy to play, this game is a combination of strategy, magic, knights, and some funny jokes. It requires you plan how to protect your castle (don’t just build and upgrade everything you can in a random order) and plan your attacks carefully (just sending every knight you have won’t cut it) in order to win every battle and make your Lord - THE Lord of the Land.


Game Features:
✔ Build and upgrade your very own medieval castle
✔ Place your defences strategically and defend against other players’ attacks
✔ Watch out and protect your lands from the Poachers
✔ Train your army of funny characters - Spearmen, Archers, Witches, Griffons and more
✔ Upgrade and evolve your army into an unbeatable force
✔ Battle players worldwide and take their Gold, Food and Trophies
✔ Challenge your friends to see who has the best army and who is the better Lord
✔ Discover your favorite attack and defence forces from countless combinations of units
✔ Watch replays of every battle - Watch your holy army in battle to improve your strategy
✔ See how you compare to other players worldwide in Google Achievements and Ranking
✔ Knights & castles themed graphics and sounds with adorable, funny characters
✔ Free action charged strategy game - You have to have strategy in your attacks!
✔ Play as either a male or a female and command your army of holy knights to victory!


Join the PaladinZ Community and get updates, participate in competitions or just watch some funny videos of our holy knights:

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/PaladinZGame/


Terms of Service: http://www.spartonix.com/#/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.spartonix.com/#/privacy
summary: Build, upgrade, and fight your way to become the greatest Paladin there is!
title: PaladinZ: Champions of Might

description: Snowboard Party brings the thrill of snowboarding to your mobile device! Get ready to ride the downhill slopes at extreme speed and catch some big air to perform the craziest tricks in 21 completely unique adrenaline-filled mountains. Jump on your board, learn new moves and improve your snowboarding skills to land sick freestyle trick combos and rack high scores! Experience snowboarding like never before!Play with your friends using the new online multiplayer mode or challenge riders from all over the world using the online leaderboards. Complete over 105 level objectives, 32 achievements, gain experience and upgrade your favorite snowboarder attributes to perform better and achieve higher scores. Customize your snow gear and upgrade your board to give you an extra edge over the competition. HIGH DEFINITION Snowboard Party includes next generation 3D sport game graphics specially optimized for your mobile hardware to provide you with the best snowboarding experience.FREESTYLE Freestyle is all about the tricks! Perform the sickest tricks using natural and man-made park features such as rails, ski jumps, boxes, logs, rocks and innumerable other objects! Create new freestyle trick combos to hit higher scores while in the trick parks. BIG AIR Go big or go home! Big air competitions are contests where riders perform extreme tricks on massive ski jumps while going down the slope at high speed. HALFPIPE Perform a wide range of tricks while going down some of the world‚Äôs biggest halfpipes. Chain multiple tricks in a row to gain more points and achieve a better score. MULTIPLAYER Challenge your friends to a snowboard battle and see who can land the baddest tricks! Share and brag your results with your friends on Twitter. MASSIVE SELECTION Select between 15 snowboarders and customize each of them to your preference, choosing your favorite gear. A massive collection of boards ranging from different sizes and designs are available, allowing you to complement your rider‚Äôs extreme skills and abilities. LEARN TO SNOWBOARDOver 50 unique tricks to master and hundreds of combinations. Follow the tutorial to get started and progress as you go. Execute the craziest combos and extreme trick sequences to rack up some impressive high scores, gain experience and make a name for yourself. GAME CONTROLLERCompatible with most game controllers available. CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS New fully customizable control system to configure your own button layout. Use the right or left handed control mode, select a control preset or create your own. Use the analog stick or accelerometer option as you wish. LOADED WITH FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Supports all the latest generation devices and optimized for high resolution displays.‚Ä¢ Online multiplayer mode to play against your friends or other riders online.‚Ä¢ New fully customizable control system. You can adjust everything! ‚Ä¢ Learn over 50 unique tricks and create hundreds of combinations. ‚Ä¢ Massive mountains to ride including 21 trails located in the Rockies, Alps and Japan. Choose from big air, freestyle, and halfpipe events. ‚Ä¢ Customize your outfit in style!‚Ä¢ Upgrade your board to improve your rider‚Äôs stats.‚Ä¢ Play often to gain experience and upgrade your favorite snowboarder‚Äôs attributes. ‚Ä¢ Share your results with your friends on Twitter. ‚Ä¢ Compatible with Android-based phones and tablets.‚Ä¢ Optimized for Intel x86 mobile devices.‚Ä¢ Extended soundtrack featuring songs from Closer, Jack Counteract, Minds Without Purpose, Mr. TaBoo Timmons, No Blitz, Paul Spencer and the Maxines, Pear, The Pinz and We Outspoken. Courtesy of Pulse Records/White Knight Music Group, Inc.‚Ä¢ Ability to purchase experience points or special items using in-app purchases. ‚Ä¢ Available in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese and Chinese. SUPPORT: http://www.maplemedia.io

comments: Bloody amazing, like that's the best way I can put it. Its good for idling but you can make real progress by tapping as well. The fact that all the upgrades are based of real things like space marines and aliens is just good. Add the good music and its almost perfect. Only thing that I don't like is how the all be it good music is just a loop so I usually just play it silent. Great game.

Great app and time waster. Currently saving up 100 Rainbow Triforces for the end cutscene. My only complaint is that the game is short. I'd love to see this game have more characters and trees added to it eventually. Other than that I won't hesitate to say that this is one of the best idle clicker games out there.

A bit weird that the game is called 'Project1_Android' on my phone, but apart from that, this game keeps me interested. I like how I can just keep it idle instead of upgrading the tap, and I can still progress alot. I find one thing weird, I don't keep the exact CPS when it's offline. Not sure if it's meant to be that way.

I beat the game and got the (warning: spoilers)    triforce after the rainbow one then reset. make a idle tree 3.0 with max level for every thing 100 or something. I AM LITERALLY THE BIGGEST FAN OF THIS GAME EVER!!!

It's an amazing game, but I might have found a bug or a glitch. When I went go play it from the shortcut, it was labled Project1_Android. I'm not sure if this is a glitch or not, but it spooked me a little bit.

This game is so awesome! I love the fact that I know all the characters and references in this game! I suggest everyone to at least beat this game once because then you can truly appreciate the thought that went into characters, trees and upgrades! On my second game now!

comments: This is absolutely a great Sudoku app. Very beautiful! Kind of must-have to someone who loves Sudoku. It would be perfect if the tiny number in the note mode could be kept in order(like 1 in the upper left corner, 5 in the centre and so on), so that we could see how many targeting number in the same line without lighting up the number. Second, the NENNAU colour mode keeps the notification bar too white that cannot see anything. Thank you !

Like the visuals.  Switching between pencil and input could be better. I often miss and remove pencil marks instead of putting in digits.  Would love a way to automatically put in initial pencil marks.  Extreme is not hard enough.  Need a way to disable ads to really replace the other app I use. Or at least turn off their sounds.

I love the minimal style but I think the graphics are getting in the way of great game play. It could use some improvement like. When you select number the app also highlights the pencilled number and its too confusing. Ability to turn off would work. Or penciled small numbers should be more grayed out it would make it cleaner. Ext..

I love this app and the minimalistic visual design of it. It has such a varied and accurate amount of difficulties, it's everything I've been looking for in a sudoku app. My only issue with it is that when it highlights the numbers that are locked in and numbers that have been penciled in, both of these numbers are highlighted the exact same color which makes it hard to distinguish them. Maybe lower the opacity of the numbers that have been penciled in or making it a darker shade would make it more visually appealing

This isn't really a bad review but I just installed the game and was greeted with a black screen. After waiting a few minutes with nothing happening, I know this is a problem. I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 (I know, old) and I was wondering if this game supports it because I may have a glitch. So I can't really say much about the game haha

Clean indeed. I like that I can give it a black theme. I don't like that I can't have errors flagged in real time (not validation). Really sucks to get down to the last few squares to find out you screwed up 20+ moves ago.  That simple addition would make this one perfect, for me.
description: Sudoku - Pretty puzzling. A free and offline Sudoku app.Presenting you a modern and rethought Sudoku design. By removing excessive details from the screen, we managed to create a fresh and clean look for the puzzle that we all love - at the same time sustaining intuitive gameplay and customization.Highlighted features:    - Selecting themes during gameplay    - Clean look and feelMore features:    - Input modes: cell first and digit first - without toggling    - Pencil marks (with automatic removal)    - 5 difficulty levels    - Top times    - Works offline    - Digit highlighting    - Count of remaining digits    - Automatic saving    - Undo    - Board validation    - Optional aids    - Edge to edge board    - Satisfying animations    - Switch on and off themesWhat to wait for:    - More themes    - Fix for vertically longer screens    - IAP, to remove adsEnjoy!EULA: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/eula/Privacy Policy: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/privacy-policy/
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku - Pretty puzzling. A free and offline Sudoku app.

Presenting you a modern and rethought Sudoku design. By removing excessive details from the screen, we managed to create a fresh and clean look for the puzzle that we all love - at the same time sustaining intuitive gameplay and customization.

Highlighted features:
- Selecting themes during gameplay
- Clean look and feel

More features:
- Input modes: cell first and digit first - without toggling
- Pencil marks (with automatic removal)
- 5 difficulty levels
- Top times
- Works offline
- Digit highlighting
- Count of remaining digits
- Automatic saving
- Undo
- Board validation
- Optional aids
- Edge to edge board
- Satisfying animations
- Switch on and off themes

What to wait for:
- More themes
- Fix for vertically longer screens
- IAP, to remove ads


Enjoy!


EULA: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/eula/
Privacy Policy: http://dustland.ee/sudoku/privacy-policy/
recentChanges: - Gameplay changes regarding cell first approach (deselecting cell deactivates digit highlight).
summary: Play Sudoku and feel beautiful!
title: Sudoku - The Clean One

description: 6 girl friends have graduated from high school and enrolled at college /university. Don't be decieved by their geeky glasses and brackets: these intelligent girls are still fashionistas in their hearts! These young smart women now officially preparing for their future career in business, social or STEM fields. At the same time, they are having the greatest time in thier lives! No pesky parents around, lots of new friends, first love, romance, crazy parties, and some cash to upgrade their wardrobes! They're lucky to have some rich parents who bought an apartment as present for their 18th birthday, and one of them even inherited a mid-size hotel business, so nothing stands in the way of their happiness and enjoyment of life!Pick one of 6 cute dolls of different races and assemble an outfit for each doll in different styles: informal, formal, business casual, geek-style, fancy, classy or other. description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:üíê a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaidsüíê makeup, hair and dress up game levelsüíê wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)üíê girly graphics and intuitive gameplayüíê free to play wedding gameüíê fun and safe for little girlsüíê no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! comments: This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

Thats's kind of ridiculous. That's the only bad thing I have to say about this game.

BEST GAME EVER! It's my biggest game but even though I have an old phone the game still runs really smoothly. There's always something to do, it never gets boring. I've been playing for 8 months. Super easy to use and learn. It's addictive. You also don't feel pressured to make purchases like other games.

I'm not a game player, but this game is a lot of fun, AND, you never have to spend a dime! Of course, unless you want to spend money!  I do wish the direction went into a little more depth. It would make it a little easier for new people to understand the extra things, like the snow boarding and the regatta.
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let‚Äôs get started!Township features:‚óè Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town‚óè Various crops to grow and later process at your factories‚óè Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill‚óè Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect‚óè Lovely animals to take care of‚óè Farms to manage and expand‚óè Exotic goods brought from islands‚óè A zoo to build where you can even breed animals‚óè Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!‚óè Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Lovely animals to take care of
● Farms to manage and expand
● Exotic goods brought from islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals
● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans!

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features*

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.
recentChanges: * A Snowboard race starting on February 9th!
* Participate in a cooking competition starting on March 2nd!
* Open your own Diner to serve customers
* Reserve tasks and send personal invitations to join your co-op
* Set your country's flag on your co-op's badge
* Enjoy a new Cinema regatta season that starts on February 13th!
summary: Township: a great game for the whole family!
title: Township

comments: The leader is too hard to catch at a lot of tracks. They'll be half a straight away ahead in just a lap of racing, and there is no way to catch them.And it would be cool to have multiple paint schemes for each driver so we don't have to look at the same cars all the time, it gets a little boring. And the Daytona 500 should be 4 or 5 laps long, 3 laps is too short. Good game though, play it pretty much everyday.

Good game. Greedy developers. You MUST pay to play or you cannot compete. Some of the in app purchases are astronomical. However, I'm an English F1 fan (which is the polar opposite of NASCAR) and the game holds my interest. Developers need to make it a little easier (and cheaper) to compete and it will be a top game. The blueprint is great but needs financial tweaking

Game is OK as a time killer. It has some fun components to it to make it interesting. Some of the in game purchase prices are ludicrous though. If they charged a one time fee of $4.99, I think I'd probably buy it. But for 5 clams you get just enough of a boost in the game to get you through the first hour of game play. Then you gotta buy more gold and whatnot to get through the next part of the game at a reasonable rate. tl ; dr kind of fun, don't spend real money on it.

Great game! But I think it could use some more additions to it like the graphics upgraded some. Maybe when you crash into a wall or another car it shows the damages and actually wrecks. Then you have to spend money to repair it. Also it would be nice if you added a area where you could design the car and customize it. But overall it's a great game I'll continue to play if it keeps improving and maybe see some of these additions

I loved this game and was near the end of my 8th season and Verizon wireless had to hard reset my phone and all my work was gone all the mo ey wether you paid money for it or not and all the cars and coins gone. I'm so psd off.  I I know the company that the app comes from isn't going to do shizzle about it

I'm going to stick around for the 2018 update and HOPE that this potentially great racing game is more about racing than what it is.   Just like everyone who loves NASCAR as much as I do,  this game is far from what we all expected to be.  We need an instant replay so we can actually get a look at all FANTASTIC graphics that we barely get a glimpse of.   The challenges are ridiculous, we can't change paint schemes, no pit stops, no pit crew, no point system and the fan zone doesn't make any sense at all.  I'm crossing my fingers that there is a big big change coming because I want to love this game!

descriptionHTML:
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO BECOME THE NEXT MONSTER ENERGY NASCAR CUP SERIES CHAMPION?
 
WELCOME TO NASCAR HEAT MOBILE
The only officially licensed, authentic NASCAR racing experience for iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad! NASCAR Heat Mobile exclusively combines the adrenaline of 200MPH stock car racing with the ability to build your own NASCAR empire in the Fan Zone.

TAKE THE WHEEL
Put yourself in the driver’s seat and experience the fast-paced thrills of NASCAR as you race from coast to coast on all 23 iconic NASCAR sanctioned tracks. Customize the way you race with tilt or touch controls, fine-tune steering assists and sensitivity adjustments, and change camera angles to drive your way.
 
BUILD YOUR NASCAR EMPIRE IN THE FAN ZONE
From Ferris Wheels and Blimps to Hot Dog Carts and Fuel Stations, you can customize your Fan Zone with 35+ buildings and decorations. Whether it’s cutting down installation time in the garage, reducing R&D costs, or earning in-game currency, each building has a special reward as you embark to make history on the track.

THE TOP NASCAR DRIVERS
Test your skills against the top drivers or sign them on to your own race team. Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series drivers include:
**Joe Gibbs Racing Toyota drivers Kyle Busch, Denny Hamlin, Matt Kenseth & Daniel Suarez
**Stewart-Haas Racing Ford drivers Kurt Busch, Kevin Harvick, Danica Patrick & Clint Bowyer
**Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet drivers Chase Elliott, Kasey Kahne, Jimmie Johnson & Dale Earnhardt Jr.
**Furniture Row Toyota drivers Martin Truex Jr. & Erik Jones
**Team Penske Ford drivers Brad Keselowski & Joey Logano
**Chip Ganassi Racing Chevrolet drivers Kyle Larson & Jamie McMurray
**And Many More!

Improve your stock car. Hit the track. Build an empire.

---

NASCAR Heat Mobile is free to play, but offers in-app purchases. By playing this game, you adhere to the Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions of 704 Games Company.

comments: I really liked the action scene where the ICE police arrested the mommy and took her children into social services. I do believe giving an emergency C-section for an illegal is a bit much for a story line, but whatever. Totally makes sense. I love how we're able to take care of the premies and foster them until they're adopted! 6/10 - Would play again if bored.
When ever I close it and open again we need to complete all levels again.  Worst

It was realy fun but I think  you should be able to choose what the mom looked like and the babies and choose if you wanted a girl or a boy and choose what teddies you wanted to give them like a rabbit toy or a dog toy but apart from that it was great. Thank you so much.
This game's control quality is terrible and I even started to get frustrated because the game wouldn't let me do something I needed to do to advance.
I kind of hated this game because it seen not realistic and it Barley let you do anything yourself but it would be good of really little kids.

nice, but it would be better if the babies weren't always the same. like when your done with their picture and want to play again, it shouldn't be always girl babies, and it shouldn't always be twin babies. please change that problemo. it's boring. ü§ì

comments: Great time killer. The packs are expensive for the bs you get. I spent over $2000 on GOW due to the decent packs, but theres no way I'd buy any mafia city packs.
Micro transactions are distroying games in every degree. Hey production and promoting team, hang yourself. This game is garbage
Worst game ever, spend a boatload of money, and then the Chinese developers ban your account and don't respond to your messages
Great game overall. Pay to play but you can build pretty well without paying. It just takes longer
Nice game and concept, But there must be events so more fun will be there in this Mafia world..
Found it a bit boring at first but I'm actually starting to enjoy it and really getting into it.

descriptionHTML:
★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★
☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather. 
☆Clan, plunder, occupy and upheavals between gangs, intrigues, and compete for the honored seat of King of Mafias.
☆Super hardcore and ultra hectic mafia life. Struggle for power and fulfill your ‘Alpha’ dream, you’ll not be able to “stop" playing!
☆Live interactive turf war, daily battle whole year round. 

★ ★Game features★ ★ 
☆☆3D HD Unity game engine, ultimate gaming screen 
Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.
☆☆Live strategy Rallying
Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work. 
Establish your Clan's forces and wake those potential talents. 
If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.

☆☆One and only worldwide server, along with professional translation system capable of translating all language to one
✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. 
✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.

☆☆Four major features and over dozens of gangster waiting to be recruited ☆☆
✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle. 
✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. 
✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! 
✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.

Mafia City Studio 
Official Customer Service email: mafia@yottagames.com
Official Facebook Fans page: https://www.facebook.com/MafiaCity.EN/
Customer Service - Secretary (Secretary always at your side)

comments: It is fun and challenging I find myself returning to play constantly to reach another level and build my team I love my mercs. I like having to find the materials too. Often going back to previous levels needing three stars for best advantage. Only problem I have is with cloud save I can't log in successfully and you must exit game to save data to your phone leave any other way all current data is gone. lOVE the game Good job.

The only way i would give this game 5 stars if there was an option to walk around instead of pressing an arrow to jump from cover to cover that ends up breaking cause your enemy's keep shooting at it. You bring all these amazing features but you take away the most important feature in any shooting game: walking around and taking cover where you like.

Its not a bad game, its actually just like the rest of the shooters on google play, which is point and shoot type of games like Zombie Frontier. I bet this game would be a lot more fun if you could walk around instead of just sitting In one place which is my only complaint. But otherwise overall this game is rather a bit fun if you are looking for a time killer.

Well executed game.  Items are there only for quick power freaks.  Looking forward to seeing the add one for the game.   PS- The English in the game isn't great and could use improvement.  It doesn't affect gameplay,  just a bit nerve wracking,  üòâ

So far it's the best game I've ever played than before. I love the graphics only that it took much time of reloading the bullets( I'm kinda an impatient person) but good job. I would totally recommend this game to my friends.
So far so good.. has vood graphics and game play its not hard but not easy and really havent had the need to spend yet i think devs have done great job keep up good work

comments: I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.

I love this app! I just wish you could collect more than 2 keys at a time. Sometimes the chapters feel short and to only be able to accumulate 2 keys feels like its not enough. 3 to 5 would be way better! Its already a bummer to not have enough diamonds to unlock cool stuff. (unless you want to pay more.. Not everyone has money to spend on phone app games)

I actually really like this game. It's fun, it's time killing, all that good stuff. But the diamonds are what really kill it.  You get one free diamond at the end of every chapter, which would be nice if it didn't cost 25+ diamonds to make a choice. So to get all the options required to have a truly full game play experiance you must buy the diamonds, which also wouldn't be a problem if they didn't cost so much. (For 5 dollars you get 60 diamonds which is ruffly 2 choices and really they should be lasting longer then that.) There isn't even the option to watch an add for more diamonds. Buying them is the only choice if you want to have those certain experiances. I understand that the company has to make money, I really do, but charging out the ass for something is not the way to do it. In short, I would love this game if it didn't cost an arm and a leg to play.

The gameplay is great but nearly all of the important choices cost. I am not opposed to paying to play a great game but the cost of this one is too high. Every chapter of every story has at least one important choice that will cost. The price for the choice is too high and there is no way to obtain free currency for the game. In order to shape a story the way you want to you have to spend a rediculous amount of real money to obtain game currency. A method of obtaining free currency and cheaper costs for choices needs to be implemented

Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1.
